front.title: A Protocol for Provisioning Resource Certificates

abstract.t: This document defines a framework for certificate management interactions between a resource issuer ("Issuer") and a resource recipient ("Subject") through the specification of a protocol for interaction between the two parties. The protocol supports the transmission of requests from the ISP, and corresponding responses from the Issuer encompassing the actions of certificate issuance, certificate revocation and certificate status information reports. This protocol is intended to be limited to the application of resource certificate management and is not intended to be used as part of a more general certificate management framework.
